query:
SELECT id as "id!: i32", 
backer_id as "backer_id!: i32", 
stake as "stake!: Decimal", 
date as "date!: UtcDateTime", 
disbursement_id as "disbursement_id!: i32" FROM backer_stakes WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR backer_id = $4::int4) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR stake = $6::decimal) AND (NOT $7::boolean OR date = $8::timestamptz) AND (NOT $9::boolean OR disbursement_id = $10::int4) ORDER BY 
      (CASE ($11 = 'Id' AND NOT $12) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($11 = 'Id' AND $12) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($11 = 'BackerId' AND NOT $12) WHEN true THEN backer_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($11 = 'BackerId' AND $12) WHEN true THEN backer_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($11 = 'Stake' AND NOT $12) WHEN true THEN stake ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($11 = 'Stake' AND $12) WHEN true THEN stake ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($11 = 'Date' AND NOT $12) WHEN true THEN date ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($11 = 'Date' AND $12) WHEN true THEN date ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($11 = 'DisbursementId' AND NOT $12) WHEN true THEN disbursement_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($11 = 'DisbursementId' AND $12) WHEN true THEN disbursement_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
     LIMIT $13 OFFSET $14 FOR UPDATE
